info.title: Google Drive
info.description: Google Drive is a file storage and synchronization service created by Google. It allows users to store files in the cloud, share files, and edit documents, spreadsheets, and presentations with collaborators.

get.description: Retrieves file metadata from Google Drive using id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the file

put.description: Updates a file in Google Drive

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the file to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Content of the file to upload to Google Drive

delete.description: Deletes a file from Google Drive

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the file to delete

patch.description: This operation appends to a file.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Select a file

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Content of the file

get.description: Retrieves file metadata from Google Drive using path

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path of the file in Google Drive

get.description: Retrieves file content from Google Drive using path

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path of the file in Google Drive

parameters.name: inferContentType
parameters.description: Infer content-type based on extension

get.description: Retrieves file content from Google Drive using id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the file to retrieve in Google Drive

parameters.name: inferContentType
parameters.description: Infer content-type based on extension

post.description: Uploads a file to Google Drive

parameters.name: folderPath
parameters.description: Folder path to upload the file to Google Drive

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the file to create in Google Drive

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Content of the file to upload to Google Drive

post.description: Copies a file on Google Drive

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Url to source file

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Destination file path in Google Drive, including target filename

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: Overwrites the destination file if set to 'true'

get.description: List files in a Google Drive folder

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the folder in Google Drive

get.description: Lists files in the Google Drive root folder

post.description: Extracts an archive file into a folder in Google Drive (example: .zip)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Path to the archive file

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Path in Google Drive to extract the archive contents

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: Overwrites the destination files if set to 'true'

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Specify the file

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Specify the worksheet

get.description: Retrieves sheet names from a Google Sheet file

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Specify the file

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

get.description: Retrieves rows from a Google Sheet

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Specify the file

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Specify the worksheet

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Specify the worksheet

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: Row to insert into the specified sheet

parameters.name: table

Id.description: The unique id of the file or folder.

Name.description: The name of the file or folder.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the file or folder.

Path.description: The path of the file or folder.

LastModified.description: The date and time the file or folder was last modified.

Size.description: The size of the file or folder.

MediaType.description: The media type of the file or folder.

IsFolder.description: A boolean value (true, false) to indicate whether or not the blob is a folder.

ETag.description: The etag of the file or folder.

FileLocator.description: The filelocator of the file or folder.

LastModifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the file or folder.

serverPagingOptions.description: List of supported server-driven paging capabilities

sortable.description: Indicates whether this table has sortable columns

ascendingOnlyProperties.description: List of properties which support ascending order only

filterable.description: Indicates whether this table has filterable columns

selectable.description: Indicates whether this table has selectable columns

Name.description: The name of the table. The name is used at runtime.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the table.

DynamicProperties.description: Additional table properties provided by the connector to the clients.

PassThroughNativeQuery.description: static schema for pass-through native query execution
